title: Building starch backbones for lab-grown meat using Lego pieces

title_detail.value: Building starch backbones for lab-grown meat using Lego pieces

summary: A new technique to spin starch fibers using Lego pieces could have future applications for lab-grown 'clean' meat, according to a team of food scientists.

summary_detail.value: A new technique to spin starch fibers using Lego pieces could have future applications for lab-grown 'clean' meat, according to a team of food scientists.
